"The Chat Log":
"About the Chat Log

This window displays a variety of messages and incidents during the game. You can also use it to enter chat messages that you want to send.

Switch between the channel to display at the top of the window and recipient channels (such as Area Only or Party Only) at the bottom of the window.

For further details, please consult the online manual. Clicking the link below will open a new page in your browser.
<&URL pso2_players_manual_communication_chat>"
